1. It would be extremely useful if I could directly set a option for specified files that should go in the archive with the windows EOL or the Unix EOL or MAC EOL.
2. Also It would be extremely useful if I could specify file(s) that can go in the archive with a different name other than stored on local disk.
3. Maybe a possibility to remove a given basedir from a property as the basedir for the newly created archive

Reasons for these 2 or 3 enhancement suggests: platform-dependencies

Actually I must always preparing, copying etc. before I could use the tar task, so the prefix-option isnt that useful for me as it could be.  Thats always really painful and pity. 


regards

4. Also it would be extremely useful if I could directly set a option for specified
files for doing integrated replaceregexp-task (e.g remove whitespaces)
